items.sentence: Tom and Mary said they hoped to be back by October 20th.
Tell Tom which bus he should take to get to the station.
Try to stay a bit more alert to what goes on around you.
Tom told me that I\'m faster at doing that than Mary is.
I knew Tom wouldn\'t do that unless you did it with him.
I think I\'ll be able to do that today before I go home.
I think it\'s unlikely Tom will come to the party alone.
You should probably tell Tom you won\'t do that anymore.
I wonder why Tom didn\'t want to come to Boston with us.
Tom regretted getting that tattoo, so he had it removed.
Tom reminds me of someone I used to know in high school.
Tom said he needed the rest of the money that I owe him.
Everyone in the city appears to be constantly on the go.
Tom is the one who told me that I should read this book.
Tom is the only man in the world that can pull this off.
Normally we have to wait for only three or four minutes.
On this matter, I feel exactly the same as way Tom does.
Tom and Mary spread their sleeping bags inside the tent.
I don\'t think that Tom knows where Mary learned French.
I don\'t watch TV as much as I used to when I was a kid.
